com.ning.http.util

Class AsyncHttpProviderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ning.http.util.AsyncHttpProviderUtils

  • public class AsyncHttpProviderUtils
extends Object
    AsyncHttpProvider common utilities.

    The cookies's handling code is from the Netty framework.
